img_text: THERESONLYTIWOJIMTRAYNORS, TWOJIMTRAYNORS! Daily Record, 13 June 2012 Rangers Website, 7 February 2013 No matter how Charles Green attempts to dressit "But why is it that so many continue to write or broad up, a newco equals a new club. When the CVA was cast that this club is a new club when it is the owners thrown out Rangers as we know them died. "They were closed and a newco must start from scratch although their fans will insist the history will be boxed up with the strips and balls and car ried into the future with the new club. who are new? Is it a lack of basic intelligence or is it something more sinister?"
